attributes.action: Stop Michael Gove from running for Prime Minister!
attributes.additional_details:
Michael Gove has done no good for this country. As the education secretary, he annoyed teachers by created a series of "reforms" that ultimately made our education system worse. 

His poisonous ideas culminated in his removal during the cabinet reshuffle, and he was placed in role of the justice secretary. In this role, he has already advocated for such stupid things as removing the human rights act!

We can only dread to think of the havoc he would cause if he became Prime minister!
attributes.background: We the undersigned would like Michael Gove to be barred from running as Prime minister. He has damaged every sector he worked in, refuses to listen to experts, and cannot be trusted.
